title: Ticket #1910: Error case in the fix for #1490
description: In the fix for ticket #1490, there is a problem: if two jobs refer to each other in their OtherJobRemoveRequirements expressions, removing one of them puts the schedd into an infinite loop. I've looked into this some, and for 7.5.6, at least, I'm going to leave thing as-is, because fixing it (or at least figuring out how to fix it) is pretty complicated, and it's a case that will never happen unless the user monkeys around with the OtherJobRemoveRequirements expressions themselves.
check_ins: 2011-Feb-09 18:43   Check-in [25856]: Documented the problem with cycles in OtherJobRemoveRequirements expressions (gittrac #1910); also documented the OtherJobRemoveRequirements attribute in the condor_submit man page. (By Kent Wenger )
